title: Apple grossed $1.65T on iPhone sales
text: APPLE'S iPhone has had a fantastic year in 2023, overtaking Samsung's throne and becoming the most-used smartphone worldwide. Last year alone, Apple shipped 235 million iPhones worldwide while 35 percent of all smartphone users owned the device. These impressive figures have helped iPhone cumulative sales revenue hit record highs. Register to read this story and more for free.
